extracted_playbook.title: Apply Security Updates
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the latest security updates to protect systems against potential exploitation, prioritizing public-facing devices and critical applications.

extracted_playbook.condition: Are there systems running Windows Server 2012 or Windows Server 2012 R2?

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade Windows Server
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade systems running Windows Server 2012 or Windows Server 2012 R2 to a supported version as soon as possible.
